body:
### Welcome to Holmes.

Holmes is a Java application that implements DLNA/UPnP protocol for playing videos, music, pictures and podcasts (RSS) to compatible devices.

Holmes has been tested on Windows and Linux with [VLC](http://www.videolan.org/vlc/) 2.x, Freebox V6 (a french set top box) and LG SmartTV devices

See [Holmes wiki](https://github.com/ccheneau/Holmes/wiki) for more information

### Download

Current Holmes version is 0.3.1
* [Download Windows installer] (https://dl.dropbox.com/u/45251579/Holmes/holmes-0.3.1-setup.exe)
* [Download Tar.gz] (https://dl.dropbox.com/u/45251579/Holmes/holmes-0.3.1.tar.gz)
